description: Manage Azure Active Directly only Authentication settings for this Synapse workspace.

commands.name: az synapse ad-only-auth disable
commands.summary: Disable Azure Active Directly only Authentication for this Synapse workspace.
examples:
az synapse ad-only-auth disable --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  -g testresourcegroup

commands.name: az synapse ad-only-auth enable
commands.summary: Enable Azure Active Directly only Authentication for this Synapse workspace.
examples:
az synapse ad-only-auth enable --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  -g testresourcegroup

commands.name: az synapse ad-only-auth get
commands.summary: Get a specific Azure Active Directly only Authentication property.
examples:
az synapse ad-only-auth get --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  -g testrg
